website_summaries.verdict: A solid, affordable door lock that offers biometric or keypad access methods plus secure Schlage key override.
pros: Capable of storing 100 fingerprints and 100 key codes
Fingerprint and code memory stays put even after system reset or power loss
cons: Fitting is a bit time-consuming and requires care

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service as great,  Door knob touch screen does not work.
customer_reviews.text: After taking a hour to install and program the lock it worked great. If the temperature is cold the finger print reader will not operate. It doesn't matter how many times you move your finger or clean off the scanner it will not work. I contacted seller to return item and they issued me a refund. Customer Service was great!
customer_reviews.author: Michael R Miller

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love this lock. If you have ever put a doorknob on before, you can do this. The confusion comes in when you place the front handle door lever on vs the back handle lever. I strongly urge you to watch their video on lock installation if you have not installed a digital lock before. The front hole takes a brass rivet which is poked in with a plier, the back handle is secured with a threaded Allen rivet. I highly recommend this lock, all functions worked first time out the gate, and Amazon helped me fix the confusion on door handle.
customer_reviews.author: AussiegirlIngridTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Keyless means convenient
customer_reviews.text: I love this lock so far, it’s so convenient to be able to get into the house without traditional keys. The installation took some time, I suggest to look up a video from YouTube, it helps a lot. Overall great product in this price range, highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Vivi

customer_reviews.title: Nice lock
customer_reviews.text: I have a few of these in my home. It's a nice lock and it works pretty well. The fingerprint reader takes a couple of tries. It should be more like cell phone fingerprint readers that take a couple of different views of your fingerprint and is able to have a better scanning success rate, but for the money this is a good lock.
customer_reviews.author: Allan J.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it was a good lock...the past few months I have been having problems with the lock. It stopped working and I changed the battery and reset the lock per manufacturer advice. Everyday I get locked out because it works on and off. Would not recommend purchasing this lock
customer_reviews.author: Janice Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: The product works faster and better than the biometric locks at work.
customer_reviews.author: Valle C. Oberg

customer_reviews.title: Finger print stopped working after a year.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for a year now, has worked well until about a month ago (11 months total use). The finger print reader no longer works. The keypad works but the finger print scanner no longer works. We replaced the batteries and still no luck.
customer_reviews.author: vik

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working and company doesn’t respond to emails.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item and installed it per the instructions. It worked just fine...for 3 days then the fingerprint part stopped working and became inoperable. Then it started just unlocking randomly and would not lock until resetting it. Came into the office with an unlocked door on 2 occasions. I emailed the company and got no response at all. I strongly urge anyone looking at these types of locks to stay clear of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Neal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lock
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a similar different brand one with this one. Much better. Works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Solana Beach Mike

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Used it in the office. Seems very well made. Overall I think it was worth the value
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Tom

customer_reviews.title: Love our lock
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and works. Wish we got it sooner
customer_reviews.author: lauren Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Buying more
customer_reviews.text: Very easy To install and it was a great price. I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: Broke just over a month later.
customer_reviews.text: Installed on our main entry and just after a month the door latch mechanism quit working and can't open door.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Clark

customer_reviews.title: Love this door handle.  No more searching for keys.
customer_reviews.text: We used it for our front door. We love it!! Haven’t been able to figure out the finger print part but the code works perfectly. Want to get another one for the garage door.
customer_reviews.author: pjbmomof3

customer_reviews.title: I need to return it back
customer_reviews.text: The lock not working and need to return it ASAP and get my refund trying to call amazon no one is available
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Debrosse

customer_reviews.title: Prime all the way
customer_reviews.text: Love it best ever. Best and price. clean. Great delivery company as well prime delivery all the way so so SO WORTH IT. Be blessed peace and love thank you. Amazon delivery
customer_reviews.author: rollenron

customer_reviews.title: Strongly question reliability of these locks
customer_reviews.text: The lock started melting from the battery after a few weeks and it stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: sats

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work long
customer_reviews.text: Fingerprint scanner is horrible. Only worked for about a day
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: problems after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: After 4 months the handle is not returning to normal position. Emailed SCYAN but no response of course..
customer_reviews.author: Steven Peavy

product_meta.title: SCYAN X9 Fingerprint Touchscreen Door Lock, Non-Handed, Satin Nickel, X9SN
product_meta.description: The X9 fingerprint touchscreen door lock offers a convenient and secure lock system solution that adopts the latest and most advanced fingerprint lock technologies. The fingerprint sensor in the lock is combined with the touch active sensor. This feature allows an easy and fast fingerprint entry--one touch on the fingerprint sensor unlocks. The lock is also equipped with a standard 12-key touchscreen. The touchscreen allows a user to unlock using a user code.
